original_title: 古巨基「Amazing World」世界巡回演唱会2011
overview: Leo Ku turned the Hong Kong Coliseum into a theme park! The innovative pop star held three concerts there in October 2011 as the first leg of his Amazing World world tour, bringing the audiences into his fantastical music dreamland. The spectacular concerts featured nearly 30 songs, including new songs like the tour theme song "Exploded"
title: 古巨基「Amazing World」世界巡回演唱会2011
